text:
International House
500 Riverside Drive
New York 27, N.T*
June 30, 1963
Mr* James A* Fellows
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 36, D.C.
Project Expendituress June 1963
Dear Jims
I herewith submit a claim for reimbursement for the
following expenditures for the NAEB-VOA project for the
month of June 1963.
June 22 Telephone call to S. Sapon, Rochester, $2.05
N.Y., from my residence in New York City
June 25 - do - .50
June 27 Charge on collect telegram from S. Sapon, 1.58
Rochester, N.Y., to me at my residence
Total $4.13
Thank you.
